pages.title: What to look for
pages.text: Shooting Stars only show up at night. Having something ready to better see them in the darkness will surely help a lot. They show up with a noticeable particle trail.

pages.title: Concise Instructions
pages.text: Your best chances to see a Shooting Star are to search for it with Night Vision and a Spyglass equipped. If you see one crashing down on the earth try to trace its steps to find out where it landed. They shoot up particles like a beam.
